column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Thanh - Thank you for your review. We greatly appreciate your feedback. I would argue that our prices are competitive not only within the market for our specialized cuisine
column2: but also within the market for restaurants in Midtown in general. And while you have stated that you probably won't visit us again
column3: I do appreciate your kind words otherwise
column4: and wish you all the best.
